aboutDescription: Hello! This is Mauro, and I hold two Mayors, Electronics and Telecomunications and also hold two Masters, Industrial Engineering and BI & Analytics. I work as a Sr. Solution Consultant at OpenText, and I use Azure and SAP for Analytics and Data Science projects. I have extensive experience leading projects and I have occupied Senior positions in big tech companies. In many occasions I coordinate multiple cross-functional teams to meet project deadlines. Leading is part of my character but I also enjoy working independently solving problems. Day by day I built up stronger my skills in Analytics and Data Science as a PhD candidate at my home towm University UNC. Persistent and relentless I persuing my dream to become a Doctor. My hobbies are retro computing, ride my bicycle long distances, and long walks in the forest. Now I am living in the south of Germany enjoying the challenges of living in a different culture and learning a new language.
